[Home](../) &gt; [@lattice/react](./) &gt; SignalProvider

## SignalProvider() function

Provides a signal service to all descendant components. Automatically disposes the service when the provider unmounts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function SignalProvider({ svc, children }: SignalProviderProps): ReactNode;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

{ svc, children }


</td><td>

[SignalProviderProps](./signalproviderprops/)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

ReactNode

## Example


```tsx
import { SignalProvider } from '@lattice/react';
import { compose, coreExtensions } from '@lattice/signals';

const svc = compose(...coreExtensions);

function App() {
  return (
    <SignalProvider svc={svc}>
      <MyApp />
    </SignalProvider>
  );
}
```
